projects.title: Codylo
projects.description: AI Code assistant that generates code, fixes code bugs, and converts images to HTML, CSS, and JavaScript using AI.

projects.title: FitTrack
projects.description: A comprehensive fitness tracking app that allows users to securely log and monitor their daily progress, including photos, weight, height, and body fat percentage.

projects.title: MarkEd
projects.description: Period Wise Attendance Marker that simplifies tracking student attendance on a per-period basis, assigning marks, and providing insights for students and teachers.

projects.title: IT Club Website
projects.description: Developed a comprehensive IT Club website using PHP, integrating an AI Chatbot, a Blog CMS with translation and audio features, and an admin panel for managing notices, events, blogs, and other administrative tasks.
